description:
Samsung has revealed Gauss2, the second-generation proprietary AI model set to significantly enhance user experiences. Paul Kyungwhoon Cheun, President and CTO of the Device eXperience (DX) Division, commented: “Samsung Electronics is committed to developing cutting-edge software, including AI and data analytics, to enhance user experiences. “With three distinct models, Samsung Gauss2 is already boosting our... Read more »

The post Samsung unveils Gauss2 AI model at SDC24 Korea appeared first on AI News.
title: Samsung unveils Gauss2 AI model at SDC24 Korea

description:
Discover how chatbots for marketing can boost your ROI with enhanced engagement and instant customer responses. What are chatbots? Chatbots are automated software applications designed to simulate human conversation. They interact with users through text or voice, providing immediate responses and performing various tasks. AI chatbots can understand and process natural language, enabling them to... Read more »

title: Boost your ROI: The impact of chatbots on marketing
